caption: Figure 1: The test loss along the training process for LTB and LSA layer.
description: This figure shows the test loss curves of both LTB and LSA models during the training process. The x-axis represents the training epoch, and the y-axis represents the test loss.  As shown, the LTB model converges to a lower test loss compared to the LSA model, suggesting its superior performance in ICL of linear regression with a shared signal.
